sentences.en: At that time, an osprey swims quickly, went to abdomen of its get down readily.
sentences.cn: 这时候, 一只鱼鹰迅速游过来, 一口把它吞下肚去了.

sentences.en: Bald eagles snatch fish at the water surface, rob osprey of fish, and eat carrion.
sentences.cn: 白头海雕常掠过水面捕鱼, 并抢夺鹗抓到的鱼, 也吃腐肉.

sentences.en: Fishing man and osprey : Beside the river, we saw a fishing man using a traditional way.
sentences.cn: 打鱼人和 鱼鹰 》在江边很快就看到了用传统方式打鱼的人.

trans.tran_en: a type of large bird that kills and eats fish
